description:
It takes some tweaking at the start, but after the program has done the initial indexing (which is a little slow), it's a great app.
The GUI takes some time to get used to, but it works pretty well overall.
summary: Dated GUI, but lots of functions

description: Best GUI tag editor for me, especial for bulk editing! Not perfect, but who is perfect?
Not found anything that I have been unable to. Nice clean interface with plenty of options.
One of the best tagging applications out there. I was able to add album art to my collection of FLAC files really quickly. Awesome work, developers!
Kind of annoying, the window won't fit on my screen so I can't see the bottom of the window, but luckily I can do everything I need with it.
summary: Does everything I need, but doesn't work well on a 768p monitor.

description: I found easytag would automatically remove categories like encoder and encoder_options from metadata in my opus files, and I had some with strange problems (converted from flac) with the description section being broken up into two fields. Easytag recognized there was a problem with the tags, and automatically "fixed" them, but I did not see the problem nor the data being removed/changed. For simple tagging of common categories easytag is convenient and easy to use, but in my experience I found it lacking when compared with kid3 and ex falso.
Be careful, EasyTag still seems to corrupt vorbis and opus files
summary: Seems to still corrupt vorbis and opus files

description:
It makes it easy to tag all the Media files, and even include cover images into the file itself.

I use it for Flac Music files, and its a great tool for that.

Theres a good scanner for correcting file names VERY easy, and a lot more.
Also a CDDB search option, that works fine.

It even correct wrongly written tags, wrong encoding etc. as they could mess up some players. 

I have several media servers and HIFI Stereo etc, where it works perfect.

Been using this for a few years now.

If you go to your option and select confirm file renaming it will ask you once and then skip duplicate file name if they already exist.

If you want to replace some special character using the scanner you'll need to escape them with a \ in from of it.
Capable, with lots of features.

I keep coming back to EasyTAG for editing FLAC tags. Does all the right things in a convenient interface. Allows for multiple edits at the same time. Typically I use it for adjusting tags from older Sound Juicer rip's.

I have used this for many years to edit the meta information on a large number of FLAC and mp3 files. Always works, edits most fields. It is missing some regular expression editing tools for bulk editing of fields. But seems to be the most intuitive to use for me.
it's a great app i recommend to install it
Makes automatic changes without telling you what it changes. I cant have either.
As a musician most of my music compiles to WAV format, so it's disappointing that I can't tag those files here. Otherwise I love the interface.
Makes it very easy to parse file names

Coming from Mp3tag or Puddletag, this is a nightmare, changes files on startup without telling you what it changed about them, VERY LIMITED options, no editable columns, unsupported since 2016, can't hide unnecessary interface elements, no amount of option tweaking stops it from trying to automatically modifying files on it's own. Thankfully it doesn't save any changes automatically as well.
it didn't work for me, getting track info from external servers worked NEVER.
Should call it 'Impossible Tag'. User instructions are extremely limited, and what there are, are misleading. About as useful in tagging multiple files as trying to hammer nails with jello.
do i even need to explain? it let's me easily edit id tags

this does everything i need to properly tag and label my lossless rips. 
thank you!
Can not save my AAC files.
Cons: confusing interface and makes even the easiest tasks complicated. Pros: it does work and is stable.
I've never had any issues with this app whatsoever. Been using it to manage my tags on my music on and off for the past few years and once again here in Ubuntu 20.04 it gives me no trouble.
I ran this program and now I have numerous files that are incorrectly tagged. Program should be removed.
summary: DO NOT DOWNLOAD! Will automatically edit tags without asking

description: Great app, it can help you to modify big music libraries metadata.Ed

There is a bug report detailing the problem and identifying the problematic commit but perfect is the enemy of good.
https://gitlab.gnome.org/GNOME/easytag/-/issues/8
summary: Works well with MP3s but corrupts OGG/OPUS files

description: Finally I can add cover art to my files. If you found VLC Media Player cannot add covert art properly, try this app.
This is a really great app for editing audio file metadata, I wish I could donate to the maintainer(s).
Tried to take over, modify and delete my music within seconds of first opening it.

I let it scan my entire music library - As soon as it finished, it spewed out a large log of all automatic changes it made without even asking me if I wanted it to make them. I don't know if it applied them though, as upon closing it warned me all changes would be discarded. I hope they are!
summary: Didn't use it - Automatically assumes changes

description: Crashes on launch with a segmentation fault (v. 2.4.3 OpenSUSE Leap 15.2, KDE Plasma 5.20)
Issues: bulk tagging, flashing/buggy ui, tags not writing to files
this software does not support fullscreen and you can't even see the whole software on HD displays
summary: you can't see the whole software on HD displays

description: Great app, works good in Ubuntu 20.04

We want to right click on a file, select Open with EasyTAG and edit thte tags. 
We do not want to wait for ever for the program to read the entired hdd everytime we open it. 
Stop it.
summary: Good but not what we want

description: easy work. on ubuntu
непонятно зачем это вообще. тэги можно править в любом плеере а эта херня не умеет даже обложки искать
Simple and like the name says EASY.
Defaults to change all files in the whole collection
The UI is nice and it works, but its behavior has always been non-intuitive. It's easy to mess stuff up.

It makes tagging audio files very easy. Only dropping a star as I've picked up 2 issues
1) When the global theme is dark, the list of audio files will alternate between a black and light hue/white background with white text, making it extremely difficult to read the white text on light background.
2) On my laptop with screen resolution of 1366x768, the app can't maximise. Clicking on the maximise button or double-clicking the title bar has no effect.
This app works very well and is very eeasy to use!
it was a matter of letting it scan the folder, automatically apply the suggestions and voilá, all perfectly tagged
Music tag search is broken... Even after changing the new URL I still get 400 and 404 errors
It doesn't claim to do so, but the app doesn't change metadata of a mp3 file. So the tags only work in easyTag. Personally i find it useless

Downloaded this to quickly update some of my songs that were missing some album art, and it worked great!
Very easy to use, no problems whatsoever.
Great MP3 tagger. Almost like MP3Tag with it's editable fields. The only issue is that none of the item lookups seems to be working (freedb.org). But has ability to add covers manually

WHY you scan HD on start??? - it's stuped, I didn't ask for it! why app do this? 4Tb!!
WHY it always said that something didn't save and I have to discard changes? I DID NOT CHANGE ANYTHING? WHY???
Why it make changes and does not tell me what it change??
After make changes in ~250 files and try to save, app fall down on ~120 file, and I have to do tag setting one more time.
It works, but a lot of troubles.
summary: As free - ok, as normal app - no

description:
A program for editing metadata that does, indeed, edit the metadata. 

Perhaps at one point is was able to do a database lookup to do it automatically, but the database has moved it looks like.

Ignore the haters, someone clearly put a lot of work and love into this app. The stuff they are complaining about can be changed in the options. I have over 400GB of music and most of it I've run through EasyTag at some point. So grateful I have access to a free tag editor this good without even having to leave Ubuntu!!
summary: Extremely good for freeware ID3 editor

description: When it scanned my music folder it trashed the ID3 tags on EVERY file and overwrote them with unknown fields. Fortunately I had a backup.
summary: Trashed ID3 tags in music collection

description: I use a Chromebook with Debian installed on it as a VM, and I wanted to edit some music file tags without being bombarded with ads like you do online. So, I tried EasyTAG. It was a great experience!
This software has save me so much time and definetly would recomend

We want to right click on a file, open with EasyTAG, and edit. 
Then if we want to edit all the tags of all the files in all the hardrives in the computer, is a nice option, but that is not what the main purpuse of the sofware should be.
summary: Good but not what we need

description: Verwende Easytag schon mehrere Jahre für meine Musiksammlung. Nach kurzer Einarbeitungszeit für mich das einfachste und beste Programm um die Metainformationen meiner Musikdateien zu bearbeiten!
summary: Einfaches und macht was es soll

description: Auch bei große Sammlungen problemloses Ablauf
summary: Absolut einfach und funktioniert super. Sehr empfehlenswert

description: erkennt z.T. externe Festplatten nicht und öffnet sich jedes Mal wenn ich aus anderen Gründen auf eine externe Festplatte zugreifen möchte. Deinstalliert...
Anwendung passt sich nicht an das Fenster in Ubuntu 20.07 an. Schaltfächen unten nicht erreichbar.
summary: Passt sich nicht an das Fenster

description: Jedesmal beim öffnen der App werden alle Tags neu eingelesen und das Programm möchte diese Korrigieren, dies lässt sich nicht deaktivieren. Ich bin alt genug um selber zu entscheiden, welche Tags ich bearbeiten will und welche nicht!! Deinstalliert.
Excelente programa, puedes etiquetar tambien con las caratulas. Eso si solo archivos mp3.
A pesar que dice easy tags no es tan facil, es confuso y tiene opciones que no sabes para que sirven, tampoco esta muy claro el como guardar los cambios.
Tiene problemas con los metadatos en archivos ogg. Al hacer cambios se daña el archivo.

Buena herramienta que permite editar metadatos de una gran cantidad de archivos de audio y vídeo.

Desafortunadamente no encuentro la opción de sustituir caracteres problemáticos al renombrar archivos y, aun peor, es la integración con gnome shell en openSUSE 42.3 donde no puedo redimensionar la ventana (hacerla más pequeña) pasado cierto punto y tampoco puedo maximizarla sin tener que arrastrar bordes.

Creo que se complementa a la perfección con kid3 pues éste último contiene funcionalidad que easyTAG no, y viceversa.
No es del todo funcional, he encontrado mejores resultados con la app Kid3-QT.

Acaba de solucionar el problema de tags de forma automática en una colección de varias decenas de CDs. De forma sorprendente en Windows 10 no me aparecía ningún error. Cambio a Fedora y la biblioteca estaba con entradas triplicadas para algún álbum y canciones sueltas fuera de su disco. Ha sido descargar EasyTAG y el programa lo ha arreglado todo de forma automática. Guardar cambios y listo. Así que muy satisfecho.

Cumple su función para poner los titulos de las canciones, el nombre del artista y del albúm, así como la carátula funciona perfectamente. Aunque no es tan intuitiva y el guardado es un poco díficl de entender al principio. Además, el tamaño de ventana es muy grande y no puedo hacerla más pequeña, incluso ignora los panales y el dock que tengo en el escritorio (KDE Plasma), las demás aplicaciones sí respetan esos límites.

Solo lo uso para modificar algunos meta-datos en archivos de audio (música), esa tarea la hace bien y merecería mis 5 estrellas… pero deben mejorar las opciones de organización y filtrado en el listado de archivos (no es muy funcional cuando la cantidad de archivos es grande) por eso en el momento le doy 4 estrellas.
la recomiendo, bastante completa
Tiene muchas opciones, así que es necesario ver un video tutorial para orientarte un poco, en caso que no te guste leer la documentación.
Utilidad sencilla
Cuesta trabajo al principio, una vez que se familiariza el usuario con las funciones, es el programa más completo que he probado.
Facil instlación, se puede añadir imagenes a los archivos de musica
No funciona desde hace un par de distros.
Permet de modifier simplement les métadonnées de fichier audio. Facile d'utilisation!
Très pratique. Beaucoup de fonctionnalités (scanneur).

SE: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS 64 bits

C'est une application extrêmement pratique, permet de voir et d'ajouter des informations à des fichiers audio.
rien que du positif
C'était une application génial dommage que le site pour mettre a jours les ID3 soit inaccessible
summary: Mise a jours des ID3 via internet terminé

description: Не понимаю смысл нерабочего приложения. Что отправить баг репорт мне предложили установит либ на 800 метров.
summary: Ужасно, постоянно падает, не исправляет ничего

description: Отличная программа, помогла навести порядок в аудиоколлекции.
программа не работает должным образом
очень сырое и глючное подделие.

Автор программы то ли больной на всю голову, то ли я не знаю. Он вообще слышал когда-нибудь об интерфейсе, о том, зачем люди придумали GUI? В ней просто вообще ни черта не понятно и что где находится и как с этим работать. Easy... ХуEasy.
Работает с множеством расширений.
Отличное приложение, работает на ура, поддерживает большое количество аудиоформатов, не перегружена функционалом. А что еще нужно для счастья?
Звук не искажает, всё просто и понятно, крч качайте и не очкуййте))))

перепробовал массу приложений, но именно это работает на все 100% у меня. Пробовал найти достойную альтернативу - но нет.
На не работающий, или работающий с ошибками фунционал не натыкался.
норма прога все как нужно работает
Отлично работает, очень шустро и быстро
看不懂鬼佬把这个软件作为fedora的默认系统软件是什么用意
summary: 看不懂鬼佬把这个软件作为fedora的默认系统软件是什么用意
